title: Mdm Specialist
tagsAndSkills: customer onboarding,PR,vendor onboarding,MDM,PO,Vendor Creation,Client Onboarding,Onboarding
jobDescription:
Hello,


PFB the roles and responsibilities:

  • Provide technical support and troubleshooting to global vendors on registration processes, profile management, requalification procedures, and portal navigation.
  • Respond promptly and effectively to online tenders (RFQs), ensuring accurate and timely submissions.
  • Facilitate invoice creation and document control processes, maintaining meticulous attention to detail.
  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure customer-centric outcomes and value-driven solutions.
  • Demonstrate strong communication skills in English, with proficiency in Arabic considered advantageous.
  • Utilize problem-solving abilities to address vendor queries and resolve issues promptly and effectively.
  • Leverage data analytics to generate insights and optimize supplier support processes.
  • Work autonomously with a proactive approach, demonstrating initiative and ownership in day-to-day activities.
  • Maintain a strong focus on time management and organizational skills, effectively managing multiple tasks and priorities.

Send your resume on varsha.si@peoplefy.com

title: HR Compensation / Benefits Professional
tagsAndSkills: Power BI,Compensation and Benefits,Benefits and Rewards,HR Operations,Compensation and Rewards,Bi,Operations,Rewards
jobDescription:
HR Compensation & Benefits

- Experience in compensation and benefit with a hand on experience in working on all aspects of Compensation and Benefits

- Manage administration of rewards, oversee governance, analytics and vendor relations

- Support C&B team on any other special projects

- Coordinate with various teams to harmonize policies, restructure compensation structure, manage defined benefit & defined contribution schemes for the new entity

- Conduct due diligence of policies and practices basis analysis of compensation practice, adherence to labor laws and various HR practices

- Responsible for end to end integration and management of HR practices/policies in all M&A's in India

- Plan, develop and implement initiatives/campaigns/awareness sessions to enhance policy awareness amongst various stakeholders

- Responsible for publishing management analytics around Rewards with key stakeholders

- Responsible for running the annual benchmarking process and related processes, communication with necessary stakeholders

- Part of team responsible for executing timely salary increases and Part of Team responsible for executing Performance Payouts

- Proficient in using MS Excel, MS PowerPoint. Knowledge of analytical tool such Power BI

title: Manager - Finance
tagsAndSkills: Ind As,Financial Controllership,Financial Reporting,Business Partnering,Finance Control,Cash Flow Management,Accounts Receivable,Forecasting
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

Responsible for overseeing financial forecasting, statement preparation, supplier payments, bank and ledger reconciliation, inventory control, audit compliance, and corporate budget consolidation


Responsibilities:

  • Monitor levels of funding and prepare cash flow projections as required especially project financing
  • Assist in the preparation of annual budgets and Cashflow forecasts.
  • To ensure all tax compliances and timely filing of the Quarterly/ Annual statutory return relating to taxes.
  • Attend to the tax assessments and statutory authorities in connection with taxation issues as and when required
  • Review the work of Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable & Payroll and ensure proper internal controls.
  • Interact with Customers and Vendors as required
  • Liaise with Operation, Maintenance, stores, IT and Human Resource Department to exercise effective accounting, financial & budgetary controls.
  • Monitor financial authorities limits and undertake administration-related functions coming under Finance Department.
  • Ensure that all MIS reports are submitted with accuracy as per the deadline.

Preferred candidate profile

  • Qualified Chartered Accountant with min. 3 to 10 years experience
  • Good Communication skills in English language, both oral and written.
  • Experience in Accounts Finalizations, MIS Reporting, and Accounts supervision
  • Excellent command in MS Excel spread-sheet
